com.esri.mo2.map.ext
Class BaseStoredQueryExtension

java.lang.Object
  |

        |

All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, LayerExtension, StoredQueryExtension
Direct Known Subclasses:
StoredQueryExtension
public class BaseStoredQueryExtension
extends BaseLayerExtension
implements StoredQueryExtension

A standard implementation of StoredQueryExtension that holds one or more StoredQuery objects.

search

protected Cursor search(QueryFilter query)
                 throws IOException
Called by the query method to obtain the Cursor result of the search. Subclasses should over-ride and provide appropriate direct searching of remote databases, if necessary.

IOException
See Also:
query(com.esri.mo2.data.feat.QueryFilter)

query

public Cursor query(QueryFilter filter)
             throws IOException
Description copied from interface: StoredQueryExtension
Sends the specified query to the database and returns the query results in the form of a Cursor. The result will be zero or more Rows whose attributes matches the QueryFilter's WhereClause. If the database is on a remote web server, then the method will "block" the calling thread until a result is obtained, or an error occurs.

Specified by:
query in interface StoredQueryExtension
Parameters:
filter - a QueryFilter usually created from the StoredQuery.createFilter method
Throws:
IOException - if any error is encountered
See Also:
Calls the protected search method to generate a Cursor.
